products.title: Create Things
products.text: When you don't create things, you become defined by your tastes rather than ability. Your tastes only narrow and exclude people. So create.

products.title: Code for Humans
products.text: Any fool can write code that a computer can understand. Good programmers write code that humans can understand.

products.title: Be Aware
products.text: Always code as if the guy who ends up maintaining your code will be a violent psychopath who knows where you live.
